answerText: Heisenberg uncertainty principle (or Heisenberg uncertainty principle)[10] Doppler broadening induces a broadened line shaped like this distribution, as per the central limit theorem. Basis sets composed of wavefunctions with this shape are fundamental in computational chemistry.
heading: SUBMIT |2014 | Yale A, OSU A | 17 | Science | Physics | College
subject: Science
question: Question:  [10] The minimum width of a spectral line is set by this physical principle, which relates the energy of an excited state to its lifetime. Another version relates position and momentum.
